attributes.action: Stop social housing rents going up to market rents for people earning over 30k.
attributes.background: As announced in the last budget, George Osbourne has said people earning over 40k in London and over 30k everywhere else will be eligible to pay market rent in social housing. . It has also been stated that we are well off. 30k after tax is not a lot at all, especially when you have a family.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105239

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
